alert.note: Alert for Greenup; Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 27 at 9:38AM EST until March 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Ohio River at Cincinnati. Ohio River at Portsmouth. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ohio River at Portsmouth. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 50.0 feet, Lowland flooding affects southern Scioto County. Backwater flooding occurs into the Scioto River, as well as along smaller creeks flowing into the Ohio River. Flood waters expand across route 73, as well as State Route 239. Much of Portsmouth itself is protected by flood walls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 48.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 49.9 feet early Monday morning. - Action stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
